item.title: Report E-2023120277
item.description:
Report E-2023120277

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-21T18:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On December 13, 2023, one (1) 55-paper bag of UN3288 was ripped in transit and released approximately two (2) pounds of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Thin Line Environmental (TLE) to remediate the impacted site. TLE personnel utilized absorbents, hand tools, and a vacuum unit to remediate the pigment-impacted trailer. All waste was collected and containerized into one (1) 35-gallon drum for transport and disposal

item.title: Report E-2023120263
item.description:
Report E-2023120263

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-21T18:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-11
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On December 11, 2023, one (1) 330-gallon tote of UN3266 was overfilled and released approximately twelve (12) ounces of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Thin Line Environmental (TLE) to remediate the impacted site. The bung lid was inspected and resecured with a new lid for continued processing and shipping. Cleaners and absorbent pads were utilized to remove any residual product. All UN3266 impacted materials and spent absorbents were collected and containerized into one (1) five-gallon pail for disposal. The pail was properly labeled, and possession of the material was taken by RLC to be disposed of through their bulk waste stream.

item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-02
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Certified personnel were notified of a distressed package, which was pulled from the system. Leakage was contained to the box. Package was placed in a lined red tote. DescribePack: One of the press and twist caps was loose allowing leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Caps were tightened to stop further leaking

item.title: Report E-2023120213
item.description:
Report E-2023120213

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: PERRYSBURG
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 1 oz of SSI solvent 150 (UN1268) released from a 55 gallon poly due to packaging failure. The release impacted the side of the drum. The SDS was reviewed with the terminal who agreed to create an overpack with proper PPE onsite. They overpacked the drum into a 65 gallon poly and it was left onsite for the terminal to manage.
